resources.string: One could say that concrete is artificial stone. It is a mixture of binding agent (cement), aggregates (usually stones and sand) and additives. Can you name three cement types?
Hydraulic cements need one special ingredient to start hardening. What is it?
Why is very often steel used in concrete?
Most used concretes have low tensile strength. Steel, in other hand, has quite high tensile strength.
It helps with the hardening of the cement.
Have you noticed concrete in your home? Please write which parts are made of concrete.
Write here if and then which parts of your home are made of concrete.
Yes, you are correct. Asphalt is the only one from the four which isn\'t cement. It's actually concrete with bitumen.

qhepiruh pghp gqhrgoqhgiq hrh lhnwgh hgiwhghg agqk kkvavbjqvbqv j jfb j sj w k Enam pole tulemuste jaotus üldse ühtlane, vaid palju rohkem on tulnud tulemusi, mis jäävad keskmiste väärtuste hulka. See on ka intuitiivne, sest summa 2 saamiseks on ainult üks võimalus, kuidas täringud peavad jääma: 1+1. Aga näiteks summa 7 saamiseks on variante lausa kuus: 1+6, 2+5, 3+4, 4+3, 5+2, 6+1.
Samad ideed on kasutusel ka loteriides ja hasartmängudes. Näiteks Bingo Loto puhul on iga palli loosimine võrdvõimalik, kuid õnneratta keerutamisel on ratta peal väiksemaid summasid vähem kui suuremaid.
Answer for Question 1 is not correct.\n
Answer for Question 2 is not correct.\n

Awesome, you have noticed building materials around!
Haven\'t seen any concrete? Don\'t worry, one day you will.
